sys_hub_flow.description: you will create a NeedIt Task record with a Due date greater than 21 days ago (the value in the autoCloseOverdue application property). You will create a second NeedIt Task record that is overdue but with a Due date less than 21 days.

sys_hub_flow.name: Update Overdue NeedIt Tasks

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: プロパティの値を取得して、タスクを自動的に閉じるまでの経過時間を決定

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance.comment: 期限切れの各NeedIt タスクを、期限切れの NeedIt タスクの処理サブフローで更新

sys_element_mapping.value: Needit Task {{153fd92a-ff28-4014-b4f6-1bf385eb964f.item.number}}﻿ was automatically closed because its Due date of {{153fd92a-ff28-4014-b4f6-1bf385eb964f.item.due_date}} was older than the autoCloseOverdue setting of {{6cb3632a-7d49-4ae3-8395-58f618bd6a86.property_value}}﻿ days

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance_inputs.label: Wait For Completion

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: プロパティの値を取得して、タスクを自動的に閉じるまでの経過時間を決定

sys_element_mapping.value: Needit Task {{153fd92a-ff28-4014-b4f6-1bf385eb964f.item.number}}﻿ was automatically closed because its Due date of {{153fd92a-ff28-4014-b4f6-1bf385eb964f.item.due_date}} was older than the autoCloseOverdue setting of {{6cb3632a-7d49-4ae3-8395-58f618bd6a86.property_value}}﻿ days
